name: TRAPPIST-1
description: A cool dwarf star with 7 Earth-size planets.

name: Kepler-22
description: Hosts Kepler-22b, a potentially habitable planet.

name: Proxima Centauri
description: Closest known star to the Sun.

name: Alpha Centauri
description: Closest binary star system to Earth.

name: Gliese 581
description: Several exoplanets in its habitable zone.

name: Tau Ceti
description: Sun-like star with five planet candidates.

name: Epsilon Eridani
description: Young nearby star with a confirmed exoplanet.

name: Vega
description: Extremely bright star, part of the Lyra constellation.

name: HD 209458
description: Famous for its transiting exoplanet HD 209458b.
